comments.creator: benjamin@smedbergs.us
comments.text: Jennifer Boriss told me to file this, so I blame her if it is a well-known dup: when customizing toolbars in a nightly build, the customization took effect only in the window which I customized: all the other windows retained the old toolbar layout.
comments.raw_text: Jennifer Boriss told me to file this, so I blame her if it is a well-known dup: when customizing toolbars in a nightly build, the customization took effect only in the window which I customized: all the other windows retained the old toolbar layout.
comments.author: benjamin@smedbergs.us
